### DNA Methylation Analysis

Deduplicated Alignment files (BAMs) were downloaded [from Becker](https://gannet.fish.washington.edu/Atumefaciens/hputnam-Becker_E5/WGBS_Becker_E5/Becker_WGBS/bismark_deduplicated/)

Methylation level was extracted

```{bash}
${bismark_dir}/bismark_methylation_extractor \
--bedGraph --counts --scaffolds \
--multicore 28 \
--counts \
--comprehensive \
--merge_non_CpG \
--buffer_size 75% \
*deduplicated.bam
```
